short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stanfordizes URLs which end in a '/' as if you were on campus!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of being off campus and not having the ".stanford.edu" automatically being added to your URL? Well, worry no more! This extension will automatically take any URL you enter which is one word and ends with a '/' and adds ".stanford.edu" to the end for you!

Examples:
"axess/" => "axess.stanford.edu"
"physics/" => "physics.stanford.edu"
"cs221/" => "cs221.stanford.edu"
